title: Anything interesting –type-wise– in Berlin in November?
content:
I am taking a trip to Berlin on the last week of November. I will make a pit stop in Leipzig’s Buch Museum, but since I’ll be in Berlin just strolling along, I am wondering... what is worth visiting there, that is related with typography?

I am sure some of you guys can give me some tips.

 [‹ Type on Jeopardy!](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203115330/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38922 "Go to previous forum topic") [Expressing change and transformation through type ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203115330/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39013 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mosh
